text: Ray Jackson (1941 - 23 April 2015) was an Australian Aboriginal activist and Wiradjuri elder. He was President of the Indigenous Social Justice Association (ISJA). He was a notable campaigner for the rights of Indigenous Australians. He was a member of the Stolen Generations. Jackson died on 23 April 2015 in the suburb of Sydney of Waterloo, New South Wales. He was 74. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Australian human rights activists Category:Indigenous Australian activists Category:People from Sydney
title: Ray Jackson (Aboriginal activist)
